attributes.action: Authorise All Frontline Police Officers To Carry The Taser Incapacitation System
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
On 11 June 2007 another Police Officer died whilst serving and protecting the British public. 
Each year, thousands of Police Officers are injured during violent confrontations and, tragically officers are being murdered. 
In issuing all Police Officers with Taser, a system with a proven track record in terms of safety and success in incapacitation, those officers will be better able to protect both the public and themselves. 
It is the right of every serving Police Officer, whilst recognising the dangers inherant to the job, to go home to his or her family at the end of their shift. Taser would, at least, help make that more likely.
